T02D2947:26b-0: @26b * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2947:26b-1: 'phags pa rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i dpa' bo
T02D2947:26b-2: gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur bar 'dod pa'i
T02D2947:26b-3: sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas sa'i cho
T02D2947:26b-4: ga la sogs pa sngon du song bas /
T02D2947:26b-5: sa stegs gru gsum me long gi ngos ltar byas la /
T02D2947:26b-6: thig gdab ste dbus ste ba mu khyud kyis bskor
T02D2947:26b-7: la lte ba ljang gu mu khyud dmar po sna
T02D2947:26b-8: tshogs padmas bskor / gru chad ljang gu bar khyams
T02D2947:26b-9: gnyis pa dkar ser sgo dang sgo khyud du bcas
T02D2947:26b-10: tshogs padmas bskor / pa bris la / mtshan nyid
T02D2947:26b-11: dang ldan pa'i bum pa la gi wang gis mtshan
T02D2947:26b-12: ma rdo rje rgya gram phyogs gcig med pa btab
T02D2947:26b-13: la las thams cad pa'i bum pa la sku dkar
T02D2947:26b-14: gyis sna tshogs rdo rje bris la byang du bzhag
T02D2947:26b-15: / p'u dza ji ltar 'byor pa dang ba lim
T02D2947:26b-16: tshogs padmas bskor / pa bris la / bsham /
T02D2947:26b-17: lag pa gnyis rdo rje bcings la mthe bong bsgrengs
T02D2947:26b-18: la srin lag sbyar te mdzub mo phyis nas /
T02D2947:26b-19: nas gang gis ma reg pa byas la mthe'u chung blang la /
T02D2947:26b-20: aom badzra dzva l'a na l'a ya h'um phat /
T02D2947:26b-21: ces pa brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i bum pa'i nang
T02D2947:26b-22: du pam dang mam las padma nyi ma brtsegs pa'i
T02D2947:26b-23: steng du h'um las rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa
T02D2947:26b-24: sku mdog ljang ser phyag gnyis kyis gser gyi bum
T02D2947:26b-25: pa rdo rje rgya gram phyogs gcig med pas kha
T02D2947:26b-27: sku la rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs pas brgyan pa /
T02D2947:26b-28: dbu la rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas kyis brgyan pa /
T02D2947:26b-29: zhal yid tsam khro ba yan lag sprul rigs bzhis brgyan pa bskyed do //
T02D2947:26b-30: de'i thugs ka'i h'um las 'od 'phros pas don gnyis byas nas /
T02D2947:26b-31: aom badzra dzny'a na h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D2947:26b-32: h'um zhes brjod pas ye shes sems dpa' 'dra ba
T02D2947:26b-33: zla ba'i gdan la bskyed la de nyid la mchod
T02D2947:26b-35: de'i thugs ka'i h'um la dmigs te /
T02D2947:26b-36: bdag nyid khrus bya ba dang /
T02D2947:26b-37: gos brje pa la sogs pa bya ste /
T02D2947:26b-39: bsdus pa la stong phrag gcig / shin tu bsdus pa la stong phrag bzlas te /
T02D2947:26b-40: slob ma la srung skud gdags pa dang /
T02D2947:26b-41: dam tshig dang sdom pa 'bogs pa la sogs pa bya ste /
T02D2947:26b-42: dkyil 'khor du gzhug / gzungs nyi shu rtsa gcig bklag tu gzhug / de nas lha ngo bstan /
T02D2947:27a-1: tu rdo rje dang dril bu'i sgras dkyil 'khor bskor /
T02D2947:27a-2: dbang rdzogs par byin la gos brje /
T02D2947:27a-4: de yang mchod pa dbul ba dang /
T02D2947:27a-9: slob mas bla ma la yon dbul /
T02D2947:27a-11: dpa' bo gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba'i
T02D2947:27a-12: bdud rtsi bum pa'i cho ga dpal mar me mdzad
